name: Dirty Bomb - Elite Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Save 70% when you unleash this army of death-dealing Mercenaries with a shipment of Elite Cases, Credits, and Boosters. Flex a fully tactical approach to your attack in London.

Elite Starter Pack includes:

15 Mercs – Permanently unlock these Mercs:
  • Stoker - Incinerates foes with Molotov grenades and locks down critical chokepoints
  • Thunder - Hurls blinding Concussion Grenades and soaks up loads of damage
  • Aimee - A sniper who saps her opponents' strength with a deployable reconnaissance device
  • Sparks - Revives teammates from afar and electrofries enemies with her REVIVR rifle
  • Nader - Demolishes enemies with a Grenade Launcher and an explosive final attack
  • Fletcher - Guarantees a violent end to enemies with his stack of Sticky Bombs
  • Kira - Calls down fire from the skies with her Orbital Laser, and deals out ammo
  • Phoenix - Uses nano-bots to burst-heal teammates and revive himself when killed
  • Redeye - Shrouds the battlefield with smoke and snipes right through with his IR Goggles
  • Rhino – Tears Mercs to shreds with his Minigun while absorbing huge damage
  • Proxy – Runs rings around problems before neutralizing them with Proximity Mines
  • Vassili – Spots enemies for teammates and takes them out at a distance
  • Sawbonez - Heals teammates while holding his own in a firefight
  • Arty - Bombards from above with Artillery and tops up teammates with ammo
  • Fragger - Lays down heavy fire and tosses explosive grenades into the mix

4 Elite Cases – Unleash four Merc Loadout Cards guaranteed to be Silver tier or above

15 Golden Equipment Cases – Unbox new Merc Loadout Cards, with a higher chance of hitting gold than standard Equipment Cases.

18 Hour Credit Booster – Double your Base-Fee of Credits earned for 18 hours of pure in-match gameplay.

25,000 Credits – Inject your Credit savings with a boost.

Limit 1 Elite Starter Pack Per Account. Packs Are Not Transferable. This Pack is Only Available in Supported Regions.

short_description: Unleash an army of death-dealing Mercenaries with a shipment of Elite Cases, Credits, and Boosters.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB - GeForce 7800GTX
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB - GeForce 7800GTX or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
